    <h3><a name="introduction">1 Introduction</a></h3>
    <p>
      This form is used to view, insert, or edit the values of a record of the history
      archive. In the history archive are stored the information about when clothes were
      worn.
    </p>
    <h3><a name="fields">2 How to compile the fields</a></h3>
    <p>
      <h5>2.1 Date</h5>
      This field represent the date of the history record.
      <h5>2.2 Garment</h5>
      Press this button to open a list and choose the garment.
    </p>
    <h3><a name="options_menu">3 Options menu</a></h3>
    <p>
      These are the options you can select:
      <h5>2.1 Edit history record</h5>
      This option is enabled only if you are in view mode and the fields are
      not editable. It allows you to edit the parameters of the history record.
      <h5>2.2 Delete history record</h5>
      Choose this option to delete the history record.
    </p>
